author: ashilton
title: Stoke 1 Manchester United 1: Wayne Rooney breaks Sir Bobby Charlton’s record in spectacular fashion with late free-kick
text:
EFL ROO BEAUTY Stoke 1 Manchester United 1: Wayne Rooney breaks Sir Bobby Charlton’s record in spectacular fashion with late free-kick 
United still 11 points behind leaders Chelsea, who have a game in hand, after Juan Mata sends Erik Pieters cross into own net By NEIL CUSTIS and ALEC SHILTON 21st January 2017, 4:56 pm
